entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing drizzle changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow and ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
